QuestData.Title: Grimtotem Chiefs: Isha Gloomaxe
QuestData.Description: Sentinel training 101: take out their leaders and your enemy's forces will soon fall apart. We're going to do just that, $c.$B$BIsha Gloomaxe is the closest of the Grimtotem chiefs. Let's see if we can't take her measure.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: She must be punished for her crimes against Freewind Post!
QuestData.RewardText: She was tougher than I thought. We worked well together, but we're going to have to make sure not to underestimate the other Grimtotem chiefs.
